Module com.vexed.vexed
Package com.comp2059.app.model.shuttle

Class AbstractShuttle

java.lang.Object
com.comp2059.app.model.GameObjects
com.comp2059.app.model.Role
com.comp2059.app.model.shuttle.AbstractShuttle
Direct Known Subclasses:
Shuttle1, Shuttle2, Shuttle3, Shuttle4
public abstract class AbstractShuttle extends Role
This is abstract shuttle class, defining the method of key event detect, move, collide check and fire.

20 December 2022
